Our Affiliates Collaborations

Affiliations in Spain

Surferpenguin is working in Spain since 2018 with the best companies in the sector.

Due to actual regulations in Spain, the way we cooperate with operators is by Custom articles, Top List updates among other collaborations.

Affiliations in Colombia

Surferpenguin is working in Colombia since 2019 with the best companies in the sector.

In Colombia, the way we cooperate with operators is by Custom articles, Top List updates and we are looking for new collaborations.

Affiliations in Peru

Surferpenguin is working in Peru since 2019 with the best companies in the sector.

In Peru we provide Custom articles, Top List updates and we are looking for new collaborations.

Affiliations in Mexico

Surferpenguin is working in Mexico since 2020 with the best companies in the sector.

Due to actual regulations in Mexico, we are still growing and offering Custom articles, Top List updates and we are looking for new collaborations..
